otherNames: Dushi Xian Wang ,Metropolis Immortal King, Immortal King Of The City ,都市仙王, Urban Immortal King
synopsis: Bai Li Yun Xiao – with a spiritual life in the continent Jiuxiao. After his death he was resurrected, however, he returned 300 years ago, returned to urban adolescence, changed his life, and climbed to the top of the world again. “Whether in heaven or on earth, only I can win”
